object.name: AlternativeTuition
object.desc: Describes any alternative tuition received by the learner. CBDS: 100234

element.name: Category
element.desc: Reason for alternative tuition. CBDS: 100235

element.name: StartDate
element.desc: Beginning date for alternative tuition. CBDS: 100236

element.name: EndDate
element.desc: End date for alternative tuition. CBDS: 100237

element.name: TotalHours
element.desc: The total number of hours provided for with the tuition.

element.name: ProvisionType
element.desc: Alternative tuition provision type. CBDS: 100279

value.name: NOT_BEST_INTEREST
value.desc: Reinstatement would be appropriate but not in best interest of learner given other circumstances

value.name: LATE_BEFORE_REGISTERS_CLOSED
value.desc: Late (before registers closed) marked as present

value.name: AUTHORISED_ILLNESS
value.desc: Authorised absence due to Illness (NOT medical or dental etc. appointments)

value.name: AUTHORISED_MEDICAL
value.desc: Authorised absence due to medical/ dental appointments

value.name: AUTHORISED_RELIGIOUS
value.desc: Authorised absence due to religious observance

value.name: AUTHORISED_STUDY_LEAVE
value.desc: Authorised absence due to study leave

value.name: AUTHORISED_TRAVELLER
value.desc: Authorised absence due to traveller absence

value.name: AUTHORISED_FAMILY_HOLIDAY
value.desc: Authorised absence due to agreed family holiday

value.name: AUTHORISED_EXT_FAMILY_HOLIDAY
value.desc: Authorised absence due to agreed extended family holiday

value.name: AUTHORISED_EXCLUDED
value.desc: Authorised absence as pupil is excluded, with no alternative provision made

value.name: AUTHORISED_OTHER
value.desc: Authorised absence as pupil is absent due to other authorised circumstances

value.name: APPROVED_OFFSITE
value.desc: Approved education activity as pupil being educated off site (not dual registration)

value.name: APPROVED_DUAL_REGISTERED
value.desc: Approved education activity as pupil is dual registered (i.e. attending another establishment)

value.name: APPROVED_INTERVIEW
value.desc: Approved education activity as pupil is attending interview

value.name: APPROVED_SPORTING
value.desc: Approved education activity as pupil is attending an approved sporting activity

value.name: APPROVED_EDUCATIONAL_TRIP
value.desc: Approved education activity as pupil is away on an educational visit or trip

value.name: APPROVED_WORK_EXP
value.desc: Approved education activity as pupil is attending work experience

value.name: UNAUTHORISED_FAMILY_HOLIDAY
value.desc: Unauthorised absence as pupil is on a family holiday, not agreed, or is taking days in excess of an agreed family holiday

value.name: UNAUTHORISED_AFTER_REGISTERS_CLOSED
value.desc: Unauthorised absence as pupil arrived after registers closed

value.name: UNAUTHORISED_ABSENCE
value.desc: Unauthorised absence as pupil missed sessions for an unauthorised absence not covered by any other code/description

value.name: UNAUTHORISED_NOT_PROVIDED
value.desc: Unauthorised absence as pupil missed sessions for a reason that has not yet been provided

value.name: NON_COMPULSORY_ABSENCE
value.desc: Non-compulsory school age absence - not counted in possible attendances

value.name: ENFORCED_CLOSURE
value.desc: Enforced closure - not counted in possible attendances

value.name: PUPIL_NOT_ON_ROLL
value.desc: Pupil not yet on roll - not counted in possible attendances

value.name: SCHOOL_CLOSED
value.desc: School closed to pupils - not counted in possible attendances

value.name: NEEDS_SUPPORT_HAS_NOT
value.desc: Needs support but has not/will not receive support

value.name: BOARDER
value.desc: Boarder, nights per week not specified

value.name: BOARDER_SIX_NIGHTS_OR_LESS
value.desc: Boarder, six nights or less a week

object.name: ChildProtectionRegister
object.desc: Information relating to the Child Protection Register as it pertains to this learner.

element.name: IsRegistered
element.desc: Indicates if the learner has been registered on the Child Protection Register. CBDS: 100042

element.name: LAId
element.desc: The LA in which the learner was registered for protection. CBDS: 100043

element.name: SiblingRegistered
element.desc: Indicates if the learner has a sibling that is also on the Child Protection Register. CBDS: 100054

value.name: NO
value.desc: Parent or guardian has refused permission

value.name: SOUGHT_NO_REPLY
value.desc: Sought, No Reply - School has sent out Fair Processing Notices, but has received no reply from parent or guardian (Data can be shared with Connexions)

value.name: UNSOUGHT
value.desc: Unsought - School has not yet sent out Fair Processing Notices (Data cannot be shared with Connexions)

value.name: YES
value.desc: Permission has been given by the parent or guardian

object.name: ContactFlags
object.desc: Contains Yes/No characteristics of the contact person's role. Provide a Yes value for all that apply. Otherwise No is assumed. At least one of the child elements of ContactFlags must have a Yes value.

element.name: ParentLegalGuardian
element.desc: Does the individual have parental or legal guardianship responsibility for the learner? CBDS: 100167

element.name: PickupRights
element.desc: Does the contact have pickup rights?

element.name: LivesWith
element.desc: Does the learner live with this contact? CBDS: 100222

element.name: AddressDisclosure
element.desc: Can address information be disclosed? CBDS: 100223

element.name: EmailCommunication
element.desc: Does the contact prefer written communcation via email? Otherwise, postal mail will be used. CBDS: 100220

element.name: EmergencyContact
element.desc: Should this contact be notified in case of emergency?

element.name: DisciplinaryContact
element.desc: Is this person to be contacted in case of disciplinary action?

element.name: HomeDuringDay
element.desc: Is the contact at home during normal daytime hours? CBDS: 100219

element.name: MemberOfArmedForces
element.desc: Is this person a member of the armed forces? CBDS: 100168

element.name: PrimaryCareProvider
element.desc: Does this person provide daily living or personal assistance to the learner?

element.name: RequiresInterpreter
element.desc: Does the contact need a translator or interpreter? CBDS: 100169

element.name: TransferAddress
element.desc: Should this contact be transferred with the Learner if and when the Learner moves? CBDS: 100224

object.name: CurrentSchoolEnrolment
object.desc: This container reflects key enrolment data for the current or current main (home) school or establishment linked to a learner. An agent may operate more efficiently if the data represented here is sufficient. If the agent requires more data or needs to retrieve enrolment data from all enroled schools then it may still need to request some or all LearnerSchoolEnrolment objects for the learner. This information should always be specified when there is an active enrolment. It must also accurately reflect the data in the represented LearnerSchoolEnrolment object and generate change events for this object when change events are detected for LearnerSchoolEnrolment.

attribute.name: LearnerSchoolEnrolmentRefId
attribute.desc: The ID (GUID) of the LearnerSchoolEnrolment record associated with this learner that is also designated as the current or current main enrolment.

element.name: LAId
element.desc: The DfES assigned number for the LA in which the learner is currently enroled with respect to their current or current main (home) school. CBDS: 100013, 100032, 100162, 900009

element.name: EstablishmentId
element.desc: The DfES assigned number for the school or establishment in which the learner is currently enroled with respect to their current or current main (home) school. CBDS: 100004, 100163, 900010

element.name: NCYearGroup
element.desc: The current or most recent National Curriculum Year Group of the learner in the LA.

element.name: Code
element.desc: Code indicating the destination type. CBDS: 100072

element.name: LAId
element.desc: The LA number for destination school or college. CBDS: 100261

element.name: EstablishmentId
element.desc: The DfES number for destination school or college. CBDS: 100260

element.name: Name
element.desc: Name of institution/employer of learner's destination. CBDS: 100073

value.name: VERBAL_ABUSE_PUPIL
value.desc: Verbal abuse/threatening behaviour against a pupil

value.name: VERBAL_ABUSE_ADULT
value.desc: Verbal abuse/threatening behaviour against an adult

element.name: Code
element.desc: Code indicating the type of exit for this enrolment. CBDS: 100244, 100318, 190090

element.name: Destination
element.desc: Describes the destination of this learner upon exit.

object.name: FormerUPNList
object.desc: A list of former UPN's assigned to the learner, since it is possible that a learner could have more than one assigned.

element.name: UPN
element.desc: A former UPN assigned to the pupil whilst at a school (eg temporary UPN was allocated when the pupil was first admitted to the school but subsequently replaced by the permanent UPN being retrieved from a previous school). CBDS: 100002

object.name: InCare
object.desc: Information relating to whether the learner is "looked after" as defined by the Children Act 1989, which refers to children who are subject to care orders and those who are accommodated.

element.name: Current
element.desc: Indicates if the learner is "looked after" currently. CBDS: 100038

element.name: Type
element.desc: Type of care the learner is in (eg fostering, children's home). CBDS: 100051

element.name: LAId
element.desc: The 'originating' authority where the learner was originally placed in public care and which looks after the child for the purposes of the Children Act 1989. CBDS: 100039

element.name: AtCurrentSchool
element.desc: Indicates if the learner has ever been in care while at this school. CBDS: 100040

element.name: PersonalEducationPlan
element.desc: Indicates if the learner in care has a personal education plan. CBDS: 100041

attribute.name: RefId
attribute.desc: The ID (GUID) assigned to uniquely identify this attendance record.

attribute.name: LearnerPersonalRefId
attribute.desc: The ID (GUID) of the learner for which this attendance mark is recorded.

attribute.name: SchoolInfoRefId
attribute.desc: The school where the attendance mark was taken.

element.name: AttendanceDate
element.desc: The date of the attendance period.

element.name: TimeIn
element.desc: The time when the learner began the attendance period.

element.name: StartTime
element.desc: The time the attendance period started. StartTime is required when this object represents a lesson

element.name: FinishTime
element.desc: The time the attendance period finished.

element.name: Session
element.desc: The session within which this attendance mark applies (e.g. AM/PM). Session is required when StartTime is not specified and the object refers to a session attendance mark (i.e. AttendanceDomain is session).

element.name: SessionLabel
element.desc: A label associated with the session to further describe the session, when applicable.

element.name: AttendanceDomain
element.desc: The attendance type.

element.name: AttendanceCode
element.desc: The attendance mark/code.

element.name: AttendanceNote
element.desc: Additional comments. Required when record is specified as a correction.

element.name: RecordTimestamp
element.desc: The date/time when recorded. When more than one record exists using the same RefId, the record with the latest timestamp is assumed to be the most current. This is possible when a record is republished due to corrections.

element.name: InputSource
element.desc: The source of the attendance record data. Could be Workforce member, biometric device, or other.

element.name: WorkforcePersonalRefId
element.desc: The ID (GUID) of the staff member responsible for recording this attendance information.

element.name: SchoolGroupRefId
element.desc: The ID (GUID) of the group that this attendance applies to. Useful when the attendance period corresponds to a lesson time.

object.name: LearnerAttendanceSummary
object.desc: This object provides a summary of a learner's daily attendance and membership information for a given school during the time period between the StartDate and EndDate, inclusive. As such, there may be multiple instances of this object for a learner in a school over the course of an academic school year. Note that sessions are defined by each school and in most cases is two but can be any number in the range 1-10. Compare with US/Canada object: StudentAttendanceSummary

attribute.name: LearnerPersonalRefId
attribute.desc: The ID (GUID) of the learner for whom this attendance information is being reported.

attribute.name: SchoolInfoRefId
attribute.desc: The ID (GUID) of the school for which this attendance information is being reported.

element.name: SchoolYear
element.desc: School year for which this information is applicable, expressed as the four-digit year in which the school year ends (e.g. 2007 for the 2006/07 school year). CBDS: 100225

element.name: StartDate
element.desc: Starting date of this attendance reporting period. CBDS: 100226

element.name: EndDate
element.desc: Ending date of this attendance reporting period. CBDS: 100227

element.name: ReasonsList
element.desc: An enumeration of sessions by reason code within the reporting period.

element.name: SessionsAttendedTotal
element.desc: The number of sessions the learner attended school when school was in session between the StartDate and EndDate, inclusive. CBDS: 100229

element.name: SessionsPossible
element.desc: The number of sessions the learner was present plus the number of sessions the learner was absent (authorised and unauthorised) when school was in session during the period between the StartDate and EndDate, inclusive. CBDS: 100228

element.name: AuthorisedAbsences
element.desc: The number of sessions the learner was absent from school with a valid excuse when school was in session between the StartDate and EndDate, inclusive. Note that ts column can be derived from Reason Status. CBDS: 100230

element.name: UnauthorisedAbsences
element.desc: The number of sessions the learner was absent from school without a valid excuse when school was in session between the StartDate and EndDate, inclusive. Note that this column can be derived from Reason Status. CBDS: 100231

element.name: AlternativeTuitionHours
element.desc: Number of Alternative Tuition (whole) hours attended between the StartDate and EndDate, inclusive. CBDS: 100238

object.name: LearnerContact
object.desc: This object contains information related to a contact person for a learner. Compare with US/Canada object: StudentContact

attribute.name: LearnerPersonalRefId
attribute.desc: The ID (GUID) of the learner whose contact this is.

attribute.name: ContactPersonalRefId
attribute.desc: The ID (GUID) of this contact.

element.name: Relationship
element.desc: Defines the relationship of the contact to the learner. CBDS: 100166

element.name: LocalId
element.desc: The locally-assigned identifier for this contact.

element.name: ContactFlags
element.desc: Contains Yes/No characteristics of the contact person's role. Provide a Yes value for all that apply. Otherwise No is assumed. At least one of the child elements of ContactFlags must have a Yes value.

element.name: ContactSequence
element.desc: Indicates the person who provided the contact sequence order. CBDS: 100221

element.name: ContactSequenceSource
element.desc: Indicates the person who provided the contact sequence order. CBDS: 100221

value.name: GUEST_PUPIL
value.desc: Guest (pupil not registered at this school but attending some lessons or sessions)

object.name: LearnerExclusion
object.desc: This object contains information related to a learner being excluded from one or more sessions of school.

attribute.name: RefId
attribute.desc: The ID (GUID) of this exclusion.

attribute.name: LearnerPersonalRefId
attribute.desc: The ID (GUID) of the excluded learner.

element.name: Category
element.desc: Exclusion category. CBDS: 100087

element.name: Reason
element.desc: Reason for exclusion. CBDS: 100088

element.name: StartDate
element.desc: Date exclusion takes effect irrespective of any review or appeal. Normally this will not be the same as Date of Leaving (exitDate) and it should be noted that the learner will remain on the schools's roll for a period after this start date. CBDS: 100089, 100090

element.name: StartSession
element.desc: Session to begin exclusion, starting with 1 for the first session of the day. In most cases there are two sessions per day but this is not always the case. Validation: Number between 1 and 10. CBDS: 100091

element.name: EndDate
element.desc: Date exclusion concludes. CBDS: 100092

element.name: ActualSessions
element.desc: Total number of sessions for which the exclusion is in effect. For lunchtime exclusions, each lunchtime for which the exclusion applies is one session. For fixed term and permanent exclusions, this is one session during the school day. For exclusions that are followed by reinstatement the actual, not the planned number of sessions should be recorded. (Exclusion sessions are used only to calculate the total allowable in a term or academic year and are not the same as an attendance session.) CBDS: 100093

element.name: Appeal
element.desc: Is there an appeal against permanent exclusion? CBDS: 100094

element.name: AppealDate
element.desc: Date for appeal against permanent exclusion. CBDS: 100095

element.name: AppealResult
element.desc: The result of the appeal against permanent exclusion. CBDS: 100096

element.name: ReinstatementDate
element.desc: Date learner was reinstated, if appropriate. CBDS: 100097

element.name: HeadTeacherNotificationDate
element.desc: Date head teacher notified parents, school LA, and home LA (if different) of exclusion. CBDS: 100098

element.name: GovernorMeetingDate
element.desc: Date of Governors' meeting with respect to exclusion. CBDS: 100099

element.name: HearingNoticeOfAppealDate
element.desc: Date of exclusion hearing/expiration of notice of appeal. CBDS: 100100

object.name: LearnerGroupEnrolment
object.desc: This object contains information about a learner's enrolment in a course (teaching group) or other (class, homeroom or registration) group. Compare with US/Canada object: StudentSectionEnrollment

attribute.name: RefId
attribute.desc: The ID (GUID) that uniquely identifies this LearnerGroupEnrolment entity.

attribute.name: LearnerPersonalRefId
attribute.desc: The ID (GUID) of the learner to whom the enrolment information applies.

attribute.name: SchoolGroupRefId
attribute.desc: The ID (GUID) of the group in which this learner is enroled.

element.name: SchoolYear
element.desc: School year for which the information is applicable, expressed as the four-digit year in which the school year ends (e.g. 2007 for the 2006/07 school year). Where a group membership is valid across multiple years, the current year at the time of publication will be used.

element.name: EntryDate
element.desc: Date from when this enrolment is valid.

element.name: ExitDate
element.desc: Date on which the learner's enrolment ends or has ended.

object.name: LearnerPersonal
object.desc: This object contains personal information related to a learner. Compare with US/Canada object: StudentPersonal

attribute.name: RefId
attribute.desc: The ID (GUID) of the learner.

element.name: LocalId
element.desc: The locally-assigned identifier for this learner. This can be the internal pupil number or any other number as determined by the publishing agent.

element.name: PersonalInformation
element.desc: Personal name, demographic, address, email, and phone information for this learner. CBDS: Mulitple

element.name: UIPI
element.desc: Unique Internal Pupil Number. CBDS: 100015

element.name: UPN
element.desc: Unique Pupil Number (UPN) allocated to each learner in maintained schools in England and Wales. It is an identifier for use in the educational context during a child's school career only and subject to Data Protection restrictions. CBDS: 100001

element.name: UPNAllocationDate
element.desc: Date UPN was allocated by the LA. CBDS: 100017

element.name: FormerUPNList
element.desc: A list of former UPN's assigned to the learner, since it is possible that a learner could have more than one assigned.

element.name: ULN
element.desc: Unique Learner Number (ULN), a 10-digit number where zero is not allowed as the leading digit.

element.name: FamilyStructure
element.desc: Indicates type of family structure learner is living in. CBDS: 100053

element.name: InCare
element.desc: Information relating to whether the learner is "looked after" as defined by the Children Act 1989, which refers to children who are subject to care orders and those who are accommodated.

element.name: ConnexionsAgreement
element.desc: Indicates if parents have consented to allow learner data to be shared with Connexions (Middle, Secondary and Special Schools only).

element.name: ChildProtectionRegister
element.desc: Information relating to the Child Protection Register as it pertains to this learner.

element.name: GiftedTalented
element.desc: Learner qualifies for Gifted/Talented status.

element.name: HomeLA
element.desc: The LA in which the learner lives but not necessarily the one in which they attend school. CBDS: 100032

element.name: LearnerIdentity
element.desc: Classification of national identity. (Wales) CBDS: 190001

element.name: ModeOfTravel
element.desc: The usual mode of travel normally used by the learner for the greater part (in distance) of the journey to and from school.

element.name: Pregnant
element.desc: Learner is pregnant. CBDS: 100056

element.name: SiblingList
element.desc: List of siblings also in same school.

element.name: UniformAllowance
element.desc: Learner is paid a uniform allowance.

element.name: CurrentSchoolEnrolment
element.desc: This container reflects key enrolment data for the current or current main (home) school or establishment linked to a learner. An agent may operate more efficiently if the data represented here is sufficient. If the agent requires more data or needs to retrieve enrolment data from all enroled schools then it may still need to request some or all LearnerSchoolEnrolment objects for the learner. This information should always be specified when there is an active enrolment. It must also accurately reflect the data in the represented LearnerSchoolEnrolment object and generate change events for this object when change events are detected for LearnerSchoolEnrolment.

element.name: PreviousEstablishmentList
element.desc: A list of known previous schools or establishments.

object.name: LearnerSchoolEnrolment
object.desc: This object defines information related to a learner's enrolment. Compare with US/Canada object: StudentSchoolEnrollment

attribute.name: RefId
attribute.desc: The ID (GUID) that uniquely identifies a particular enrolment.

attribute.name: LearnerPersonalRefId
attribute.desc: The ID (GUID) of the learner to whom this information is linked.

attribute.name: SchoolInfoRefId
attribute.desc: The ID (GUID) of the school to which this enrolment applies.

attribute.name: MembershipType
attribute.desc: The type of this enrolment as it relates to the school identified by SchoolInfoRefId. CBDS: 100060

element.name: EntryDate
element.desc: The date from when this enrolment is valid. CBDS: 100063

element.name: NCYearGroupActual
element.desc: The year group in which the learner is taught for the majority of their time, regardless of their chronological age. CBDS: 100068

element.name: ClassType
element.desc: Indicates if the learner is in a nursery class. Must be set to 'O' if age on August 31 is >= 6. CBDS: 100069, 100325

element.name: ExitDate
element.desc: The ending date of this enrolment. If the learner has exited before the end of the school year, ExitDate must have a value. CBDS: 100064

element.name: Sessions
element.desc: Number of learner sessions (half days) per week. A maximum of 10 is possible per week.

element.name: FTPTStatus
element.desc: An indication of whether the learner is enroled only part time. CBDS: 100065

element.name: Boarder
element.desc: Indicates whether the learner is a boarder at the school or not. CBDS: 100067

element.name: AlternativeTuition
element.desc: Describes any alternative tuition received by the learner. CBDS: 100234

object.name: LearnerSpecialNeeds
object.desc: This object contains information about a learner's special education needs (SEN) where provisioned within a school. Learner's with no special educational needs will not have this object defined.

attribute.name: RefId
attribute.desc: The ID (GUID) that uniquely identifies a learner special need (provision).

attribute.name: LearnerPersonalRefId
attribute.desc: The ID (GUID) of the learner with special educational needs.

attribute.name: SchoolInfoRefId
attribute.desc: The ID (GUID) that uniquely identifies the school provisioned to work with the learner's special needs.

element.name: UnitMember
element.desc: Is this learner with special education needs (SEN) in a mainstream school a member of an SEN Unit (sometimes called special class)? CBDS: 100075

element.name: ResourcedProvisionMember
element.desc: Is this learner with special education needs (SEN) in a mainstream school a member of a resourced provision? CBDS: 100076

element.name: NextReviewDate
element.desc: Date of learner's next SEN review. CBDS: 100079

element.name: Provision
element.desc: A provision (stage) accommodated for this learner within this school.

element.name: StartDate
element.desc: Date when learner was placed on the current SEN stage. Date may be in the future.

element.name: EndDate
element.desc: Date when learner finished this SEN stage. Assumed to be current unless a date in the past is specified here.

element.name: SENTypeList
element.desc: A list of Special Educational Needs types for this learner. Note that each SEN type must have its own unique ranking, and all rankings must be consecutive starting with 1.

element.name: AdviceAndAssessmentLevel
element.desc: Level of provision for Advice and Assessment. (Wales)

element.name: GroupingAndSupportLevel
element.desc: Level of provision for Grouping and Support. (Wales) CBDS: 190011

element.name: SpecialisedResourcesLevel
element.desc: Level of provision for Specialised Resources. (Wales) CBDS: 190012

element.name: TeachingMethodsLevel
element.desc: Level of provision for Curriculum and Teaching Methods. (Wales) CBDS: 190010

element.name: EmbeddedBasicSkillsSupport
element.desc: Provision of Embedded Basic Skills support beyond the attainment of formal qualification. CBDS: 190120

element.name: LiteracyLevelStart
element.desc: Level of literacy at start of this SEN stage. (Wales) CBDS: 190070

element.name: LiteracyLevelEnd
element.desc: Level of literacy achieved by the end of this SEN stage. (Wales) CBDS: 190072

element.name: NumeracyLevelStart
element.desc: Level of numeracy at start of this SEN stage. (Wales) CBDS: 190071

element.name: NumeracyLevelEnd
element.desc: Level of numeracy achieved by the end of this SEN stage. (Wales) CBDS: 190073

element.name: NationalCurriculumList
element.desc: A list of National Curriculum subjects that have been modified or disapplied for this Learner.

element.name: MedicalFlag
element.desc: Is there medical information on this Learner? CBDS: 100084

element.name: ParamedicalSupport
element.desc: Type of therapy needed by Learner. CBDS: 100086

element.name: MedicalNotes
element.desc: Summary of learner's medical condition. CBDS: 100085

value.name: GUEST
value.desc: Guest (pupil not registered at this school but attending some lessons or sessions)

value.name: CAR_SHARE
value.desc: Car Share (with a child/children from a different household)

object.name: NationalCurriculum
object.desc: A National Curriculum subject that has been modified or disapplied for this Learner.

element.name: Modification
element.desc: How is the National Curriculum used for this learner?

element.name: Subject
element.desc: National Curriculum subject(s) for which modification or disapplication applies.

object.name: NationalCurriculumList
object.desc: A list of National Curriculum subjects that have been modified or disapplied for this Learner.

element.name: NationalCurriculum
element.desc: A National Curriculum subject that has been modified or disapplied for this Learner.

object.name: PreviousEstablishment
object.desc: A previous school or establishment.

element.name: EstablishmentId
element.desc: DfES Establishment Number for this school.

element.name: EstablishmentName
element.desc: School's name as indicated on the Annual Schools Census.

element.name: LAId
element.desc: The 3-digit LA number assigned by DfES.

element.name: EntryDate
element.desc: The date the learner entered this school or establishment.

element.name: ExitDate
element.desc: The date the learner exited this school or establishment.

element.name: ExitType
element.desc: Code indicating the type of exit from this school or establishment.

element.name: LastSchool
element.desc: An indication of whether the described school or establishment was the last establishment the learner attended. Note that it is possible that more than one establishment can be marked as LastSchool when a learner is enroled in more than one school simultaneously.

object.name: PreviousEstablishmentList
object.desc: A list of known previous schools or establishments.

element.name: PreviousEstablishment
element.desc: A previous school or establishment.

object.name: Reason
object.desc: Learner attendance marks by code and number.

element.name: Code
element.desc: The attendance code. CBDS: 100232, 190110

element.name: Type
element.desc: The attendance code type.

element.name: Status
element.desc: The authorised status of the attendance code.

element.name: Total
element.desc: The total number of sessions attributed to this reason between StartDate and EndDate for the specified reason. CBDS: 100233

object.name: ReasonsList
object.desc: An enumeration of sessions by reason code within the reporting period.

element.name: Reason
element.desc: Learner attendance marks by code and number.

value.name: SCHOOL_ACTION
value.desc: School Action or Early Years Action

value.name: SCHOOL_ACTION_PLUS
value.desc: School Action Plus or Early Years Action Plus

value.name: SCHOOL_ACTIONPLUS_STATUTORY
value.desc: School ActionPlus and Statutory Assessment (for historical and/or local purposes only - not valid for PLASC/School Census)

object.name: SENType
object.desc: A list of Special Educational Needs types for this learner. Note that each SEN type must have its own unique ranking, and all rankings must be consecutive starting with 1.

attribute.name: Ranking
attribute.desc: A value (starting at 1) indicating the order of significance of special educational need in relation to other SEN types listed here. CBDS: 100080

object.name: SENTypeList
object.desc: A list of Special Educational Needs types for this learner. Note that each SEN type must have its own unique ranking, and all rankings must be consecutive starting with 1.

element.name: LearnerPersonalRefId
element.desc: The ID (GUID) of the LearnerPersonal record for this sibling.

element.name: UIPI
element.desc: The Unique Internal Pupil Number for a sibling of this learner. CBDS: 100018

object.name: SiblingList
object.desc: List of siblings also in same school.

element.name: Sibling
element.desc: A sibling of this learner in the same school.

value.name: IND_ACCESS_NORMAL
value.desc: Individual access to normally available equipment

value.name: ACCESS_HIGHLY_SPECIALISED
value.desc: Dedicated access to highly specialised equipment

value.name: LA_ILLNESS
value.desc: Alternative Tuition by LA because of Illness

value.name: LA_EXCLUSION
value.desc: Alternative Tuition by LA because of Permanent Exclusion

value.name: LA_OTHER
value.desc: Alternative Tuition by LA for Other Reason

value.name: HOME
value.desc: Alternative Tuition at Home by Parents/Carers

value.name: CRS_CAR_SHARE
value.desc: Car Share (with a child/children from a different household)
